main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:LegStrength} gives her 5 {status:Agility} every turn. All her skills gain more Power or damage based on speed and some get additional buffs at 10+ speed (S1 and S3 gain coin reuse, S2 and S3 gain more damage, S3 inflicts an additional {status:BurstAgility}).
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff gives him {status:Burst} Count on hit with an unopposed attack (once per turn).
other: Inflicts {status:BurstAgility} with her S3, which inflicts +1 {status:Burst} Count when triggering {status:Burst} at 10+ speed and deals additional {keyword:Gluttony} damage based on {status:Burst} when fully consumed. The coin reuse on her S3 inflicts an additional stack of {status:BurstAgility} after she fully consumes the stack inflicted by the first coin.
Her passive gives bonus damage if she has {status:LegStrength} and her target has {status:BurstAgility}.
Her S2 and S3 inflict more {status:Burst} Count if she uses it unopposed.

1111201.desc: If this unit has [LegStrength] and the target has [BurstAgility], deal +5% damage for every [LegStrength] (max 15%)
1111201.name: Heishou Mutation [Mao]

1111221.desc:
1 ally with the fastest Speed: when attacking targets with [Burst], deal +10% damage
Gain 1 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
1111221.name: A Husk of Hares
